= Translations Wanted =

We would love to see the CCTM available in your language!  If you are able to provide a translation, refer to the *lang/custom-content-type-mgr.pot* file.  Using [http://www.poedit.net/ PoEdit] or a similar editor, create .po and .mo translations of the original .pot file.  See [http://codex.wordpress.org/Translating_WordPress Translating WordPress] for more information..
